welcome_heading: Welcome to the Book Management System
welcome_text: This system allows you to easily manage your book collection. You can perform the following actions:
welcome_add_book_text: Add a New Book: To add a book fill the form with details about the book. The system will guide you through the process.
welcome_search_books_text: Search for Books: Find books by entering the title. The system will display matching results.
welcome_all_books_text: All Books: View all books in the library.
welcome_easterEgg_text: Easter Egg: Try to find the hidden easter egg in the system. It's a fun surprise!
